def_cn: 巨蟹宫，巨蟹座(黄道十二宫之一。6月21日至7月22日之间出生的人属此星座)
def_en: Cancer is one of the twelve signs of the zodiac. Its symbol is a crab. People who are born approximately between the 21st of June and the 22nd of July come under this sign.

def_cn: 出生于巨蟹宫时段的人
def_en: A Cancer is a person whose sign of the zodiac is Cancer.
Cancer is a serious disease in which cells in a person's body increase rapidly in an uncontrolled way, producing abnormal growths.
